name: Pacman's Drunken Dream
description:
This is a design concept for one of my course modules. The idea was to combine the games 'Pac-man' and 'Fall down'. The game turned out slightly different and is very short.

All rights, beside the game itself belong to namco. I do not own the rights to pacman or any other images belonging to the pacman games. This was just simply to upload for my course.
